headerDisplay: HomeKit control of TERMA's 'MOA Blue' range of bluetooth enabled heated towel rails and elements.
footerDisplay: This plugin requires a running moa-web-server somewhere physically close enough to the heating element to control it. See 'INSTALLATION' for instructions covernig how to install this component.
title: HomeBridge Thermostat Accessory Config Schema

name.description: The name to appear in Homekit.

deviceAddress.description: Bluetooth MAC address of the heater device (e.g. 'CC:22:37:10:43:4B'). This can be found using the web server /discover function.

baseUrl.description: The base URL for the moa_web_server used to connect to the device (note: without a trailing /).

drying.description: When set to >=30 (Â°C), heater will be set to this temperature instead of being turned off when no heating is needed to provide towel warming function.

pollInterval.description: Polling interval in milliseconds (default is 300000 ms - 5 minutes).
